mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(u_id, u_password, u_name, u_email, u_phon, u_gender) VALUES (#{uId}, #{uPassword},#{uName}, #{uEmail}, #{uPhon}, #{uGender})
mapper.select: select * from user where u_id=#{uId} and u_password = #{uPassword}
mapper.update: update user set u_password=#{uPassword}, u_email=#{uEmail}, u_phon=#{uPhon} where u_pk=#{uPk}
update user set u_imgurl=#{uimgUrl} where u_pk=#{uPk}
